landing_page.header_slogan: Stay ahead in the fast-changing world of digital media
landing_page.credits: MediaMind was build in cooperation between EUTOP, the Technical University of Munich and CSEE during the Javascript Technology Practicum.
landing_page.dashboard_text: Clean interface to manage all profiles in one Dashboard. You can edit your profiles here and adjust topics and keywords at anytime
landing_page.topics_text: Specify your topics of interest with the desired keywords and get AI suggestions for the best additional keywords
landing_page.add_topic: You want to add topics and more? Login and get access to all features!
landing_page.click_reports: You want to see reports and more? Login and get access to all features!
landing_page.search_profile_text: Topic and article matches are rated by relevance based on semantic similarity. You can also search in the Vector Database directly via the searchbar
landing_page.article_header: Read articles directly in the application
landing_page.article_text: Get a detailed overview of the article and all its topics with scores and keywords
landing_page.email_header: Every morning - directly in your Inbox!
landing_page.email_text: Receive your tailored reports daily via email. You can download them or visit the article directly in the application
landing_page.breaking_text: Stay informed with all global breaking news in one spot. Accessible with just one click from the dashboard
landing_page.breaking_toast: You want to see breaking news and more? Check out the breaking news preview or log in!
landing_page.sp_toast: You want to create your own Search profile? Log in and enjoy all features
landing_page.edit_profile_toast: You want to edit profiles and more? Log in and experience all features!
landing_page.reports_toast: You want to view reports and more? Log in and experience the full functionality!
landing_page.delete_profile_toast: You want to delete profiles and more? Log in and experience the full functionality!
landing_page.checkout_sp_toast: You want to see the search profile and more? Check out the search profile preview or log in!
landing_page.original_toast: You want to access articles and more? Log in and experience the full functionality!

mock_email.text_1: This is your daily news report, carefully picked to match your specific interests and search criteria. Our system has identified the most relevant developments in your field, ensuring you stay informed with the insights that matter to your business.
mock_email.text_2: Each story has been selected based on its relevance to your profile, providing you with a comprehensive overview of today's key developments.
mock_email.text_footer: After that, you can still access your report anytime via your dashboard
mock_email.download_toast: You want to download reports and more? Log in and experience all features!
mock_email.click_here_toast: You want to view the full dashboard and more? Log in and experience all features!

mock_data.breaking_title_1: Breakthrough in Sustainable Tire Technology Reduces Microplastic Emissions
mock_data.breaking_summary_1: A German startup has developed a biodegradable tire compound that significantly reduces microplastic emissions without compromising performance. Early tests show a 40% drop in road wear particles.
mock_data.breaking_title_2: EU Announces New Incentives for Hydrogen Truck Adoption
mock_data.breaking_summary_2: The European Commission unveiled a subsidy program aimed at accelerating the transition to hydrogen-powered freight transport, with up to â‚¬150,000 available per vehicle for eligible operators.
mock_data.breaking_title_3: French Automotive Supplier Launches AI-Driven Battery Diagnostics Platform
mock_data.breaking_summary_3: ValeonTech has introduced a new software solution for EV manufacturers that leverages AI to predict battery degradation and optimize charging behavior over time.
mock_data.breaking_title_4: Norway's Offshore Wind Expansion Set to Power 2 Million Homes
mock_data.breaking_summary_4: Norway's government has approved funding for a 6.5 GW offshore wind farm in the North Sea, expected to begin construction in 2026. The project will be one of the largest of its kind in Europe.

article-page.entities_text: Displays entities related to the article.
article-page.limited_content_description: This article displays only a summary in place of the full content. Your organization's subscription is not valid. For full access, please contact your administrator.
